post_title: FS: Trimmed T206 Bobby Wallace - $60 delivered **SOLD**
post_content:
Hello. I have the below pictured T206 Bobby Wallace for sale.  As you can see, the side and top borders have been trimmed off, but what remains is nice looking.  Card is graded ISA Authentic.

Price is $60 delivered via any payment method you prefer. 

**CARD IS SOLD..THANK YOU**

Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!
